alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 5:18PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Hamilton County through 545 PM CDT... At 518 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Giltner, or 14 miles southeast of Grand Island, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, heavy rain and half inch diameter hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Giltner. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 319 and 326. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
